import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {selectCartItems,selectCartTotal} from "../../redux/cart/cart.selectors" import {toggleCartHidden} from "../../redux/cart/cart.action" import './checkout.styles.scss' const CheckOutPage = ({cartItems,total,dispatch}) =>{ dispatch(toggleCartHidden()); return (
\
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name) }
TOTAL: ${total}
)} const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOutPage);
